readability_reflection: I found string concatenation more readable because the pluses and spaces is more readable for the user compared to interpolation.
comprehension_debugging: String interpolation was very hard to read as I had to decipher the curly brackets and the parentheses as well as the quotes to make sure I was making the right string. Concatenation was a little bit easier to read as the pluses and spaces separate the strings well.
preference_rationale: I would prefer string concatenation as it is easier to read and understand.
learning_curve: I have more familiarity with concatenation as I was introduced to that first compared to interpolation. Even now I don't fully understand interpolation.
